name: Warfield (android, iOS)
description:
Become a modern military soldier and together with your friends, begin combat in this 2d multiplayer co-op shooter game.

Select your military soldier and use his special abilities to start epic multiplayer combat in Warfield with up to 6 players online in this multiplayer shooter!

Choose your army allies and begin dynamic combat on 3 different military maps in player-vs-player mode.

Select your favourite weapon from a huge arsenal of modern weapons. 

Get into modern combat, strike fast and use military force to gain the battle ground!

Warfield is a free multiplayer game for all military and combat lovers. 

Game features:
- Up to 6 players online!
- 3 various military classes
- 20 combat weapons
- 3 military maps
- 2 different game modes
- 126 different levels
- Dynamic gameplay
- Co-op battle with your friends
